verses.verse: Then it came <WH1961> about after <WH310> the plague, <WH4046> that the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH559> to Moses <WH4872> and to Eleazar <WH499> the son <WH1121> of Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> saying, <WH559>

"Take <WH5375> a census <WH7218> of all <WH3605> the congregation <WH5712> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> by their fathers' households, <WH1004> whoever <WH3605> is able to go <WH3318> out to war <WH6635> in Israel. <WH3478>"
So Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest <WH3548> spoke <WH1696> with them in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho, <WH3405> saying, <WH559>

"[Take a census of the people] from twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> as the Lord <WH3068> has commanded <WH6680> Moses. <WH4872>" Now the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> who came <WH3318> out of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> [were: ]

Reuben, <WH7205> Israel's first-born, the sons <WH1121> of Reuben: <WH7205> [of] Hanoch, <WH2585> the family <WH4940> of the Hanochites; <WH2599> of Pallu, <WH6396> the family <WH4940> of the Palluites; <WH6384>
of Hezron, <WH2696> the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites; <WH2697> of Carmi, <WH3756> the family <WH4940> of the Carmites. <WH3757>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Reubenites, <WH7206> and those who were numbered <WH6485> of them were 43730.
And the son <WH1121> of Pallu: <WH6396> Eliab. <WH446>

And the sons <WH1121> of Eliab: <WH446> Nemuel <WH5241> and Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram. <WH48> These <WH1931> are the Dathan <WH1885> and Abiram <WH48> who <WH7148> were called <WH7148> by the congregation, <WH5712> who <WH834> contended <WH5327> against <WH5921> Moses <WH4872> and against <WH5921> Aaron <WH175> in the company <WH5712> of Korah, <WH7141> when they contended <WH5327> against <WH5921> the Lord, <WH3068>

and the earth <WH776> opened <WH6605> its mouth <WH6310> and swallowed <WH1104> them up along with Korah, <WH7141> when that company <WH5712> died, <WH4194> when the fire <WH784> devoured <WH398> <WH250> men, <WH376> so that they became <WH1961> a warning. <WH5251>
The sons <WH1121> of Korah, <WH7141> however, did not die. <WH4191>

The sons <WH1121> of Simeon <WH8095> according to their families: <WH4940> of Nemuel, <WH5241> the family <WH4940> of the Nemuelites; <WH5242> of Jamin, <WH3226> the family <WH4940> of the Jaminites; <WH3228> of Jachin, <WH3199> the family <WH4940> of the Jachinites; <WH3200>
of Zerah, <WH2226> the family <WH4940> of the Zerahites; <WH2227> of Shaul, <WH7586> the family <WH4940> of the Shaulites. <WH7587>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Simeonites, <WH8099> 22200.

The sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to their families: <WH4940> of Zephon, <WH6827> the family <WH4940> of the Zephonites; <WH6831> of Haggi, <WH2291> the family <WH4940> of the Haggites; <WH2291> of Shuni, <WH7764> the family <WH4940> of the Shunites; <WH7765>
of Ozni, <WH244> the family <WH4940> of the Oznites; <WH9006> of Eri, <WH6179> the family <WH4940> of the Erites; <WH6180>
of Arod, <WH720> the family <WH4940> of the Arodites; <WH722> of Areli, <WH692> the family <WH4940> of the Arelites. <WH692>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Gad <WH1410> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 40500.
The sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> [were] Er <WH6147> and Onan, <WH209> but Er <WH6147> and Onan <WH209> died <WH4191> in the land <WH776> of Canaan. <WH3667>

And the sons <WH1121> of Judah <WH3063> according to their families <WH4940> were: of Shelah, <WH7956> the family <WH4940> of the Shelanites; <WH8024> of Perez, <WH6557> the family <WH4940> of the Perezites; <WH6558> of Zerah, <WH2226> the family <WH4940> of the Zerahites. <WH2227>
And the sons <WH1121> of Perez <WH6557> were: of Hezron, <WH2696> the family <WH4940> of the Hezronites; <WH2697> of Hamul, <WH2538> the family <WH4940> of the Hamulites. <WH2539>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Judah <WH3063> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 76500.

The sons <WH1121> of Issachar <WH3485> according to their families: <WH4940> [of] Tola, <WH8439> the family <WH4940> of the Tolaites; <WH8440> of Puvah, <WH6312> the family <WH4940> of the Punites; <WH6324>
of Jashub, <WH3437> the family <WH4940> of the Jashubites; <WH3432> of Shimron, <WH9616> the family <WH4940> of the Shimronites. <WH8117>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Issachar <WH3485> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 64300.

The sons <WH1121> of Zebulun <WH2074> according to their families: <WH4940> of Sered, <WH5624> the family <WH4940> of the Seredites; <WH5625> of Elon, <WH356> the family <WH4940> of the Elonites; <WH440> of Jahleel, <WH3177> the family <WH4940> of the Jahleelites. <WH3178>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the Zebulunites <WH2075> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 60500.
The sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> according to their families: <WH4940> Manasseh <WH4519> and Ephraim. <WH669>

The sons <WH1121> of Manasseh: <WH4519> of Machir, <WH4353> the family <WH4940> of the Machirites; <WH4354> and Machir <WH4353> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Gilead: <WH1568> of Gilead, <WH1568> the family <WH4940> of the Gileadites. <WH1569>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Gilead: <WH1568> [of] Iezer, <WH372> the family <WH4940> of the Iezerites; <WH373> of Helek, <WH2507> the family <WH4940> of the Helekites; <WH2516>
and [of] Asriel, <WH844> the family <WH4940> of the Asrielites; <WH845> and [of] Shechem, <WH7928> the family <WH4940> of the Shechemites; <WH7930>
and [of] Shemida, <WH8061> the family <WH4940> of the Shemidaites; <WH8062> and [of] Hepher, <WH2660> the family <WH4940> of the Hepherites. <WH2662>

Now Zelophehad <WH6765> the son <WH1121> of Hepher <WH2660> had <WH1961> no <WH3808> sons, <WH1121> but only <WH518> daughters; <WH1323> and the names <WH8034> of the daughters <WH1323> of Zelophehad <WH6765> were Mahlah, <WH4244> Noah, <WH5270> Hoglah, <WH2295> Milcah <WH4435> and Tirzah. <WH8656>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Manasseh; <WH4519> and those who were numbered <WH6485> of them were 52700.

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> according to their families: <WH4940> of Shuthelah, <WH7803> the family <WH4940> of the Shuthelahites; <WH8364> of Becher, <WH1071> the family <WH4940> of the Becherites; <WH1076> of Tahan, <WH8465> the family <WH4940> of the Tahanites. <WH8470>
And these <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Shuthelah: <WH7803> of Eran, <WH6197> the family <WH4940> of the Eranites. <WH6198>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Ephraim <WH669> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 32500. These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Joseph <WH3130> according to their families. <WH4940>

The sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families: <WH4940> of Bela, <WH1106> the family <WH4940> of the Belaites; <WH1108> of Ashbel, <WH788> the family <WH4940> of the Ashbelites; <WH789> of Ahiram, <WH297> the family <WH4940> of the Ahiramites; <WH298>
of Shephupham, <WH8197> the family <WH4940> of the Shuphamites; <WH7781> of Hupham, <WH2349> the family <WH4940> of the Huphamites. <WH2350>
And the sons <WH1121> of Bela <WH1106> were Ard <WH714> and Naaman: <WH5283> [of Ard,] the family <WH4940> of the Ardites; <WH716> of Naaman, <WH5283> the family <WH4940> of the Naamites. <WH5280>
These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Benjamin <WH1144> according to their families; <WH4940> and those who were numbered <WH6485> of them were 45600.

These <WH428> are the sons <WH1121> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families: <WH4940> of Shuham, <WH7748> the family <WH4940> of the Shuhamites. <WH7749> These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Dan <WH1835> according to their families. <WH4940>
All <WH3605> the families <WH4940> of the Shuhamites, <WH7749> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, were 64400.

The sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to their families: <WH4940> of Imnah, <WH3232> the family <WH4940> of the Imnites; <WH3232> of Ishvi, <WH3440> the family <WH4940> of the Ishvites; <WH3441> of Beriah, <WH1283> the family <WH4940> of the Beriites. <WH1284>
Of the sons <WH1121> of Beriah: <WH1283> of Heber, <WH2268> the family <WH4940> of the Heberites; <WH2277> of Malchiel, <WH4439> the family <WH4940> of the Malchielites. <WH4440>
And the name <WH8034> of the daughter <WH1323> of Asher <WH836> [was] Serah. <WH8294>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of the sons <WH1121> of Asher <WH836> according to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them, 53400.

The sons <WH1121> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families: <WH4940> of Jahzeel, <WH3183> the family <WH4940> of the Jahzeelites; <WH3184> of Guni, <WH1476> the family <WH4940> of the Gunites; <WH1477>
of Jezer, <WH3337> the family <WH4940> of the Jezerites; <WH3340> of Shillem, <WH8006> the family <WH4940> of the Shillemites. <WH8016>
These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Naphtali <WH5321> according to their families; <WH4940> and those who were numbered <WH6485> of them were 45400.
These <WH428> are those who were numbered <WH6485> of the sons <WH1121> of Israel, <WH3478> 601730.
Then the Lord <WH3068> spoke <WH1696> to Moses, <WH4872> saying, <WH559>
"Among these <WH428> the land <WH776> shall be divided <WH2505> for an inheritance <WH5159> according to the number <WH4557> of names. <WH8034>

"To the larger <WH7227> [group] you shall increase <WH7235> their inheritance, <WH5159> and to the smaller <WH4592> [group] you shall diminish <WH4591> their inheritance; <WH5159> each <WH376> shall be given <WH5414> their inheritance <WH5159> according <WH6310> to those who were numbered <WH6485> of them.
"But the land <WH776> shall be divided <WH2505> by lot. <WH1486> They shall receive <WH5157> their inheritance <WH5157> according to the names <WH8034> of the tribes <WH4294> of their fathers.
"According <WH5921> <WH6310> to the selection by lot, <WH1486> their inheritance <WH5159> shall be divided <WH2505> between <WH996> the larger <WH7227> and the smaller <WH4592> [groups.]"

And these <WH428> are those who were numbered <WH6485> of the Levites <WH3881> according to their families: <WH4940> of Gershon, <WH1648> the family <WH4940> of the Gershonites; <WH1649> of Kohath, <WH6955> the family <WH4940> of the Kohathites; <WH6956> of Merari, <WH4847> the family <WH4940> of the Merarites. <WH4848>

These <WH428> are the families <WH4940> of Levi: <WH3878> the family <WH4940> of the Libnites, <WH3846> the family <WH4940> of the Hebronites, <WH2276> the family <WH4940> of the Mahlites, <WH4250> the family <WH4940> of the Mushites, <WH4188> the family <WH4940> of the Korahites. <WH7145> And Kohath <WH6955> became <WH3205> the father <WH3205> of Amram. <WH6019>

And the name <WH8034> of Amram <WH6019>'s wife <WH802> was Jochebed, <WH3115> the daughter <WH1323> of Levi, <WH3878> who <WH834> was born <WH3205> to Levi <WH3878> in Egypt; <WH4714> and she bore <WH3205> to Amram: Aaron <WH175> and Moses <WH4872> and their sister <WH269> Miriam. <WH4813>
And to Aaron <WH175> were born <WH3205> Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu, <WH30> Eleazar <WH499> and Ithamar. <WH385>
But Nadab <WH5070> and Abihu <WH30> died <WH4191> when they offered <WH7126> strange <WH2114> fire <WH784> before <WH6440> the Lord. <WH3068>

And those who were numbered <WH6485> of them were 23000, every <WH3605> male <WH2145> from a month <WH2320> old <WH1121> and upward, <WH4605> for they were not numbered <WH6485> among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> since <WH3588> no <WH3808> inheritance <WH5159> was given <WH5414> to them among <WH8432> the sons <WH1121> of Israel. <WH3478>

These <WH428> are those who were numbered <WH6485> by Moses <WH4872> and Eleazar <WH499> the priest, <WH3548> who <WH834> numbered <WH6485> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the plains <WH6160> of Moab <WH4124> by the Jordan <WH3383> at Jericho. <WH3405>

But among these <WH428> there was not a man <WH376> of those who were numbered <WH6485> by Moses <WH4872> and Aaron <WH175> the priest, <WH3548> who <WH834> numbered <WH6485> the sons <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> in the wilderness <WH4057> of Sinai. <WH5514>

For the Lord <WH3068> had said <WH559> of them, "They shall surely <WH4191> die <WH4191> in the wilderness. <WH4057>" And not a man <WH376> was left <WH3498> of them, except <WH3588> <WH518> Caleb <WH3612> the son <WH1121> of Jephunneh, <WH3312> and Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun. <WH5126>
